title: Apple Nicotine Pouches By Killa
description: TRY KILLA APPLE NICOTINE POUCHES Apple Nicotine Pouches by Killa gives you a taste experience of freshly picked apples. A sweet and sour taste of your favourite fruit, as you would expect from your favourite brand. View all Killa Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Medium Pouches View all Drinks Flavour Pouches KEY FEATURES: Apple flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users 16mg Per Gram | 12.8mg Per Pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT APPLE FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES The pouches' 16 mg nicotine strength is designed for experienced nicotine pouch users. The pouches may give your lip a fresh sweet apple flavour. MORE ABOUT NICOTINE POUCHES Discreet, slim pouches containing tobacco-free nicotine are packed into these stylish cans that fit perfectly in your pocket. Simply pop the pouch under your lip and you're ready to go.
